entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 6:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
